thread.title: U.S. curbs Arctic offshore oil drilling
thread.title_full: U.S. curbs Arctic offshore oil drilling - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jennifer A. Dlouhy
title: U.S. curbs Arctic offshore oil drilling
text: WASHINGTON — The Obama administration’s decision Friday to cancel two auctions of Arctic drilling rights and turn down two companies’ requests for more time to explore the area likely close off new energy development in the region for years to come.
